title: NFL Middle Finger; NBA Tell J.R. Smith to Cover Tattoo
itunes:title: NFL Middle Finger; NBA Tell J.R. Smith to Cover Tattoo
description:
Scott Soshnick and Eben Novy-Williams discuss a host of issues related to the business of sports, including whether the first trial in the NCAA corruption case will be a litmus test for others. Also discussed is the National Basketball Association's banning of a J.R. Smith corporate logo tattoo, Earl Thomas being carted off the field -- and flashing the middle finger -- and a pair of baseball tiebreakers on the same day. Hosts: Scott Soshnick, Eben Novy-Williams and Michael Barr Producer: Madena Parwana

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
